EmailTemplate.name: WC-2012-07-Become a Partner.Become a Partner Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome To The VMTurbo Partner Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{Lead.First Name}}, Welcome to the VMTurbo Authorized Partner Program! We are excited to work with you and in order to help you get established, please follow the steps in our Partner Starter Kit <http://vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/vmturbo-partner-starter-kit.pdf>. Please send any questions or concerns to partners@vmturbo.com <http://info.vmturbo.com/y2XZOqIZ1g0gHIr06n00010>.
Regards,
The VMTurbo Partner Team
